data.Text: I'm a student at UC Berkeley studying computer science and business under the [met] program. Most recently, I tinkered with compilers and trading systems at [js].

Previously, I helped ship [branching] at [figma], worked on revenue platform at [stripe], the Azure Marketplace at [msft], and data science / machine learning research at [u.ai]. I also set up computer vision infrastructure for autonomous vehicles under Professor [whitney].

Outside of work / academics, I'm involved with some communities on campus. I was a vice president and project manager at [codebase], and pre-quaratine I occasionally partook in IM tournaments ğŸ with friends. I've also mentored courses with [csm] and have been active in [hkn].
In my free time, I love to build things ğŸ”§, listen to & produce music ğŸ¹, splash around in pools ğŸŠâ€â™‚ï¸, try to make sense of things ğŸ“š, and (re)watch Netflix & Crunchyroll ğŸ“º.
